civics_garrison_soldier_infected: 1 enemy soldier was infected during the battle
civics_garrison_soldiers_infected: %0 enemy soldiers were infected during the battle
civics_garrison_defeat: Ваша армия понесла поражение. %0 солдат погибло в бою.
civics_garrison_defeat_revive: Ваша армия понесла поражение. %0 солдат погибло, но %1 солдат были оживлены.
civics_garrison_tactic_ambush_desc: Attempt to ambush a rival caravan and steal their goods. Low risk operation, but low reward.
civics_garrison_tactic_raid_desc: Attempt to raid a rival camp. Medium risk operation with average payoff potential.
civics_garrison_tactic_pillage_desc: Attempt to pillage a rival settlement. High risk operation with superior payoff potential.
civics_garrison_tactic_assault_desc: Attempt to assault a rival town. Very High-risk operation with huge payoff potential.
civics_garrison_tactic_siege_desc: Attempt to siege a rival city. Allows you to occupy an enemy city as long as %0 troops remain alive after the siege.
civics_garrison_no_spy: Мало данных, оценить результат сражения невозможно. Отправьте больше шпионов.
civics_garrison_army_label: Численность солдат для участия в военных кампаниях.
civics_garrison_soldier_desc_herb: Солдаты в мирное время посвящают себя охоте. В данный момент они приносят %0 %1 за охотничью прогулку.
civics_garrison_soldier_desc: Солдаты в мирное время посвящают себя охоте. В данный момент они приносят %0 %2 за охотничью прогулку и %1 %3.
civics_garrison_evil_soldier_desc: Idle soldiers spend their time trapping mortals. They are currently bringing in %0 %3, %1 %4, и %2 %5 в секунду.
civics_garrison_evil_soldier_desc_bonele: Idle soldiers spend their time trapping mortals. They are currently bringing in %0 %2, %1 %3 в секунду.
civics_garrison_evil_alt_soldier_desc: Солдаты в мирное время посвящают себя охоте. В данный момент они приносят %0 %3, %1 %4, и %2 %5 в секунду.
civics_garrison_evil_alt_soldier_desc_he: Солдаты в мирное время посвящают себя охоте. В данный момент они приносят %0 %2 и %1 %3 в секунду.
civics_garrison_evil_alt_soldier_desc_fl: Солдаты в мирное время посвящают себя охоте. В данный момент они приносят %0 %1 в секунду.
civics_garrison_wounded_desc: Раненые солдаты менее эффективны в бою и имеют больше шансов погибнуть в бою. Со временем раненые солдаты снова встанут в строй.
civics_garrison_crew_desc: Военное подразделение переведено в экипаж корабля.
civics_mad_reset_desc: Это сбросит вашу игру; вы заработаете немного %0 и получите небольшой бонус. Экспортируйте игру перед сбросом.
civics_mad_missiles_world_control_desc: Разрешить или отменить доступ к красной кнопке запуска ракет. Очистите мир ядерным пламенем. Зачем? Потому что вы можете.
civics_mad_missiles_desc: Разрешить или отменить доступ к красной кнопке запуска ракет. Ядерный удар вызовет взрывную волну, которая приведет к гибели всей известной жизни на планете.
civics_mad_missiles_warning: Это уничтожит все живое на планете. Эволюция начнется заново. Вы получите %0 %1.
power_grid_header: Нажимайте и перетаскивайте чтобы сменить приоритет энергообеспечения зданий.
govern_anarchy_desc: В Анархии нет правителей. Огромная личная свобода компенсируется слабой устойчивостью общества при большом количестве жителей. По мере роста населения его стихийное поведение будет постепенно погружать страну в хаос.
govern_anarchy_effect: С ростом популяции производство переходит в упадок. Стресс уменьшен вдвое.
govern_autocracy_desc: Автократия - это форма правления, при которой один человек единолично удерживает власть в стране. Никто не может оспорить его авторитет.
govern_autocracy_effect: Стресс на %0% выше, но армия на %1% сильнее. Отменяет штраф Милитариста.
govern_democracy_desc: Democracy is a form of government where all the people collectively make decisions together. This is popular with the people but makes getting anything done tedious.
govern_democracy_effect: Entertainers are %0% more effective, but worker production is %1% lower.
govern_oligarchy_desc: Oligarchy is a form of government where the elite rule as a council. A handful of powerful families control everything and make all the major decisions.
govern_oligarchy_effect: Tax revenue is %0% lower, but taxes can be set %1% higher, high tax morale penalty is lower, and people are less likely to riot.
govern_oligarchy_effect_alt: Taxes can be set %0% higher, high tax morale penalty is lower, and people are less likely to riot.
govern_theocracy_desc: A Theocracy is a state that is ruled by religious elite. The church is the supreme institution and everything is usually done in the name of God. As the head of the church, your word is law.
govern_theocracy_effect: Temples are %0% more effective. Professors are %1% less effective. Scientists are %2% less effective.
govern_theocracy_effect_alt: Temples are %0% more effective. Professors are %1% less effective. Scientists are %2% less effective. Priests boost Ziggurats.
govern_republic_desc: A Republic is similar to a democracy, only people elect officials to represent them in government instead of voting on everything themselves.
govern_republic_effect: Bankers are %0% more effective and morale is raised by %1%, but people protest about every random thing.
govern_socialist_desc: Under a socialist government the state owns everything. Personal freedom is low but the state provides for all basic needs.
govern_socialist_effect: Crafting gains a %0% bonus, and manufacturing gains %1%. Stress is increased by %2%. Money income is reduced by %3%.
govern_corpocracy_desc: A corpocracy is a society that has taken capitalism to an extreme. The government is controlled by a board of the most powerful CEOs.
govern_corpocracy_effect: Tax revenue is halved, but income from casinos (+%0%), luxury goods (+%1%), and tourism (+%2%) is higher. Morale suffers a -%3% penalty but factories produce %4% more.
govern_technocracy_desc: A technocracy is similar to an oligarchy only the ruling council is composed of people who are considered the top experts in their fields. Scientific or technical knowledge is valued most.
govern_technocracy_effect: Знания costs are reduced by %0%, but raw material costs are increased by %1%. Знания generated is also increased by %2%.
govern_technocracy_effect_alt: Знания costs are reduced by %0%. Знания generated is also increased by %1%.
govern_federation_desc: A federation is a system of government where individual states largely govern themselves but are united under a central government.
govern_federation_effect: Rival cities under your control grant %0% more production. They also require no upkeep cost unless under military occupation. Morale is raised by %1%.
govern_federation_effect_alt: Unification production bonus is raised from +%0% to %1%. Morale is raised by %2%.
govern_magocracy_desc: A magocracy is government run by a ruling council of arch mages. The pursuit of magic is emphasised over all other concerns.
govern_magocracy_effect: Wizards produce %0% more mana. Crystal production increased by %1%.
resource_Plasmid_desc: %0 активных Плазмид ускоряют темпы производства на %1%.
resource_Plasmid_desc2: Также они наделяют пространственным мышлением, что приводит к увеличению вместимости хранилища на %0%.
resource_Phage_desc: Фаги увеличивают предел действующих Плазмид на 1 за Фаг. Текущий предел эффекта Плазмид - %0.
resource_Phage_desc2: Фаги увеличивают предел действующих Плазмид и Анти-Плазмид на 1 за Фаг. Текущий предел эффекта - %0.
resource_Dark_desc_s: Dark Energy increases your storage bonus by %0%.
resource_Dark_desc_e: Dark Energy increases the loot gained from combat by %0% and increases Soul Gem drop chance.
resource_Dark_desc_m: Dark Energy reduces planetary cost creep by %0 and space cost creep by %1.
resource_Dark_desc_h: Dark Energy reduces the heavy fuel cost penalty to %0% and to %1% beyond your solar system.
resource_Dark_desc_a: Dark Energy increases all power generated by %0%.
resource_Dark_desc_mg: Dark Energy increases the production of %0 by %1%.
resource_Harmony_desc: Harmony Crystals boost the effectiveness of Dark Energy by %0% per crystal. They also provide a space cost creep discount of %1 in the current universe.
resource_modal_crate_construct_desc: Соорудить ящик стоимостью %0 %1. Каждый ящик вмещает %2 единиц ресурса.
resource_modal_crate_unassign_desc: Убрать ресурсы из ящика (-%0 единиц ресурса)
resource_modal_crate_assign_desc: Сложить ресурсы в ящик (+%0 единиц ресурса)
resource_modal_container_construct_desc: Соорудить контейнер стоимостью %0 Стали. Каждый контейнер вмещает %1 единиц ресурса.
resource_modal_container_unassign_desc: Убрать ресурсы из контейнера (-%0 единиц ресурса)
resource_modal_container_assign_desc: Сложить ресурсы в контейнер (+%0 единиц ресурса)
space_home_test_launch_effect: Запустить экспериментальную пробную ракету в космос.
space_home_test_launch_action: Вы успешно отправили в космос свою первую ракету
space_home_satellite_desc: Запустить искуственный спутник для проведения научных исследований
space_home_gps_effect_req: You need a minimum of 4 GPS satellites to establish a GPS signal. The first 3 effectively do nothing.
space_moon_info_desc: Спутник на орбите планеты %0. Составляет примерно 1/10 массы планеты %0 и не имеет атмосферы.
space_moon_mission_action: Ваши луноходы обнаружили на поверхности спутника многочисленные месторождения Иридия и Гелия-3.
space_red_info_desc: The red planet %0 orbits the sun at a distance of about 1.4AU.
space_red_mission_effect: Launch a mission to survey the red planet %0
space_red_mission_action: %0 doesn't offer much in the way of rare resources but your scientists consider it to be the best prospect for an off-world colony.
space_red_factory_effect1: Factories can be used to produce any number of manufactured goods.
space_red_asphodel_desc: Cultivate asphodel flowers to attract mediocre souls
space_red_biodome_flair: All it took was growing a potato
space_red_asphodel_flair: For the souls who will never reach paradise
space_red_exotic_lab_flair2: the wall here to see what sticks.
space_red_ziggurat_desc: Ziggurat dedicated to an ancient race of %0
space_hell_info_desc: The planet %0 is located about 0.4AU from the sun and is very hot.
space_hell_mission_effect1: Launch a mission to survey the hellish planet %0.
space_hell_mission_action: %0 is a hot planet close to the sun. Its prospects for development are poor.
space_hell_swarm_plant_effect1: Reduces the cost of swarm satellites by %0%
space_sun_info_desc: The star at the heart of the %0 system.
space_sun_mission_effect1: Launch a mission to study the sun.
space_sun_swarm_control_effect1: Controls up to %0 Swarm Satellites and transmits their power back to civilization.
space_gas_info_desc: The planet %0 is a gas giant located about 5.2AU from the sun. It is the largest planet in the %1 system.
space_gas_mission_effect: Launch a mission to study the gas giant %0.
space_gas_mission_action: %0 is truly massive, its atmosphere is rich in Helium-3.
space_gas_storage_desc: Orbital depot used to store fuels
space_gas_moon_info_desc: %0 is the largest moon orbiting the gas giant %1.
space_gas_moon_mission_action: A superdense material composed entirely of neutrons has been discovered on %0.
space_gas_moon_drone_effect1: Increase the output of mining outposts by %0%
space_belt_info_desc: The asteroid belt is located between %0 and %1, it is a potentially rich source of resources.
space_belt_info_desc2: You must assign space miners to increase support in the asteroid belt.
space_belt_mission_desc: Launch a survey of the Asteroid Belt
space_belt_mission_effect1: Launch a mission to study the asteroid belt for potential mining opportunities.
space_belt_mission_action: The asteroid belt is extremely hazardous but contains immense mineral wealth.
space_dwarf_info_desc: %0 is a dwarf planet located about 2.8AU from the sun. It is the only known dwarf planet in the inner solar system.
space_dwarf_mission_action: %0 appears to be a lifeless rock with little resources of value. It's the perfect place to store hazardous materials.
space_dwarf_collider_effect1: Construct a 1-mile segment of the world supercollider
space_dwarf_collider_flair: What's the worst that could happen?
interstellar_alpha_desc1: Alpha Centauri is a nearby binary star system located 4.36 light years from %0. We suspect several planets may be orbiting it.
interstellar_alpha_desc2: Alpha Centauri is a nearby binary star system located 4.36 light years from %0. The 4th planet, designated Alpha Centauri IV, is a candidate for a permanent extrasolar base.
interstellar_alpha_mission_effect: Send a ship to the Alpha Centauri system to survey it.
interstellar_alpha_mission_result: Alpha Centauri IV appears to be a great candidate for a colony.
interstellar_mining_droid_effect: Mining Droids can be tasked to extract valuable materials from the ground. They can be set to mine Adamantite, Uranium, Coal, or Aluminium.
interstellar_int_factory_effect: Manufacture new materials from old materials. Each Mega Factory has two production lines.
interstellar_proxima_desc1: Proxima Centauri is a red dwarf located about 0.21 light years from the Alpha Centauri system.
interstellar_proxima_desc2: Proxima Centauri is a red dwarf located about 0.21 light years from the Alpha Centauri system. A lone rocky planet orbits the system.
interstellar_proxima_mission_effect: Send a ship to the Proxima Centauri system to determine if it has any value.
interstellar_proxima_mission_result: A lone rocky planet of little value orbits the Proxima system. However, Proxima's strategic position makes it a great place for an interstellar base of operations.
interstellar_xfer_station_desc: A deep space station used as a hub for the region
interstellar_nebula_desc1: The Helix Nebula is quite far away at 694 light years, but this could be a very rich source of Helium-3 to fuel your expansion.
interstellar_nebula_desc2: The Helix Nebula is quite far away at 694 light years. It is rich in valuable Helium-3.
interstellar_nebula_mission_effect: Send a ship to the Helix Nebula to evaluate it for possible gas mining operations.
interstellar_nebula_mission_result: The Helix Nebula is rich in Helium-3, as expected. It also contains Deuterium, and deposits of Elerium have been detected.
interstellar_nexus_desc: A deep space station used as a hub for the region
interstellar_neutron_desc1: A neutron star has been detected roughly 619 light years away.
interstellar_neutron_desc2: The Neutron Star, Calvera, is roughly 619 light years from %0.
interstellar_neutron_mission_effect: Embark on a dangerous mission to study the neutron star, Calvera.
interstellar_neutron_mission_result: Dangerous x-ray emissions make the neutron star Calvera extremely dangerous to approach; only shielded craft should approach it.
interstellar_stellar_forge_flair: The power of the sun in the palm of your hand
interstellar_blackhole_desc1: A small black hole has been detected 487 light years from %0.
interstellar_blackhole_desc2: The blackhole is located 487 light years from %0. It is small as far as blackholes go, with a mass of only 8 solar masses.
interstellar_blackhole_desc3: The blackhole is located 487 light years from %0. It has a mass of %1 solar masses.
interstellar_blackhole_desc4: The blackhole is located 487 light years from %0. It has a mass of %1 solar masses, with exotic matter making up %2 solar mass.
interstellar_blackhole_desc5: The blackhole could be worth %0 %3, %1 Phage, and %2 Dark Energy if it were to somehow explode...
interstellar_blackhole_mission_result: The blackhole is relatively low mass. While still highly dangerous, this makes it easier to study.
interstellar_blackhole_unstable: The blackhole is starting to emit odd readings, this might be due to the exotic matter contamination.
interstellar_stellar_engine_effect3: Blackhole mass is %0 solar masses, with exotic matter making up %1 solar mass.
interstellar_mass_ejector_effect: Eject mass into the blackhole to enlarge it
interstellar_mass_ejector_flair: This is a good idea, this is fine
interstellar_mass_ejector_msg: A new tab is available under "resources"
interstellar_jump_ship_effect: Construct a special ship designed to navigate a natural wormhole. This ship must be heavily shielded and requires a unique drive capable of jumping into and out of an unstable wormhole.
interstellar_wormhole_mission_effect: Send the specially designed jump ship into the unstable wormhole and see what's on the other side.
interstellar_wormhole_mission_result: You have successfully jumped the wormhole, an analysis of the stars places the destination as somewhere in the Andromeda galaxy!
interstellar_stargate_effect: Using the jumpship to transverse the natural wormhole we can construct matching stargates which will allow stable travel to the faraway Andromeda galaxy without specially designed ships that can withstand jumping a singularity.
interstellar_sirius_desc: Sirius is a binary star system 8.6 light years from the %0 system. Sirius A is a type M star while Sirius B is a White Dwarf.
interstellar_sirius_b_desc: Sirius B is a white dwarf star, which means fusion has stopped and it has cooled enough for the surface to solidify but it will continue to radiate great amounts of heat for trillions of years.
interstellar_sirius_mission_effect: Sirius is a system that was previously of low interest to the %0 Empire, but the ascension project has caused interest in studying a White Dwarf star and its close proximity to the %1 system makes it an ideal candidate.
interstellar_sirius_b_effect: Analyze Sirius B to unlock its secrets.
interstellar_space_elevator_effect: Sirius B's gravity is too strong to simply land ships on it, we need to construct a space elevator to access the surface.
interstellar_gravity_dome_effect: Sirius B's gravity is 350,000x stronger than %0. A special dome that can withstand the extreme pressure is required to house the project.
interstellar_ascension_machine_effect: The "Ascension Machine" is a device that can elevate your people to a new plane of existence. Constructing and activating this device is the ultimate goal for the %0 race.
interstellar_ascension_trigger_effect: The Ascension Machine, turning on this device will elevate your people to a new plane of existence.
interstellar_thermal_collector_effect: Reduces the power requirement of the Ascension Machine by -%0MW.
galaxy_piracy_msg: The %0 pirates have taken notice of your operations. You must increase security in each sector to counter the threat.
galaxy_stargate_desc: The region around the stargate is mostly empty space. There is a nearby star system 0.4 light years away but not much else in the vicinity.
galaxy_stargate_desc_alt: The stargate is a critical transit point for your empire, security in this area will affect all production in Andromeda.
galaxy_gateway_station_desc: Gateway Station is a first stop foothold in the new galaxy.
galaxy_telemetry_beacon_effect1: +%0 Макс Знания for each active Telemetry Beacon.
galaxy_gateway_desc: The Gateway system is the closest destination from the stargate at 0.4 light years. Logistically this makes it a good staging ground for your expansion.
galaxy_gateway_mission_effect: Send a ship to the Gateway System to scout it for use as your base of operations in the Andromeda galaxy.
galaxy_encounter: One of your scout ships encountered an unknown alien vessel, your ship was destroyed after a failed attempt to communicate with the aliens.
galaxy_gorddon_desc: The Gorddon system is 14 light years from the stargate and seems to be a hotbed for alien activity. The system was named in honor of captain Gorddon who died during the first contact disaster.
galaxy_gorddon_mission_effect: A high amount of alien activity has been detected in the Gorddon System, it's possible a colony exists there. Attempt to make second contact with this species.
galaxy_gorddon_mission_result: You have established contact with a species of %0 that calls themselves %1. The first contact incident seems to have been the work of a hostile rival species of %2 called %3 but your relationship remains tenuous.
galaxy_embassy_complete: You have established relations with the %0 race. You can now negotiate trade routes with them by constructing freighters. The %0 warn you that %1 piracy is a big concern in the region, you'll need to protect your interests by building up your armada.
galaxy_symposium_effect2: +%0 Макс Знания per active Galactic Trade Route
galaxy_symposium_effect3: +%0 Макс Знания per crew stationed in system
galaxy_freighter_assign: Assign a freighter to import %0 and export %1.
galaxy_freighter_unassign: Unassign a freighter from importing %0 and exporting %1.
galaxy_alien1_desc: The %0 System is the home system of the %1. It is a binary star system 4.2 light years from the Gorddon System.
galaxy_consulate_desc: The Consulate is your local diplomatic office in the %0 system.
galaxy_vitreloy_plant_desc: Requires Power, Bolognium, Stanene, and Money.
galaxy_alien2_desc: The %0 System is a type G star system with heavy %1 activity in it. This system is rich with resources and the %1 do not take kindly to anyone else approaching it.
galaxy_alien2_mission_effect: Station the required invasion force at the %0 system then initiate the attack.
galaxy_alien2_mission_result2: You have successfully broken the %0 blockade establishing a foothold in the system.
galaxy_scavenger_find: Your scavengers have recovered an alien database. You should research the alien data.
galaxy_chthonian_desc: The Chthonian system is named such because it contains the only known Chthonian planet ever detected by you. Strange readings emanate from the planet however the system is also fiercely guarded by the %0.
galaxy_chthonian_mission_result: You have weakened the enemy forces enough to allow entry into the system.
galaxy_chthonian_mission_result_losses: The following ships were lost during the battle: %0.
portal_first_gem: Your soldiers discovered a peculiar stone in the aftermath of a battle. It makes everyone who goes near it uneasy and almost seems to be alive.
portal_corrupt_gem: The Soul Forge has produced an unusual Soul Gem, anyone who touches it is overcome by fits of rage and temporary insanity.
portal_fortress_desc: A large fortress constructed in the Hell dimension to guard the portal.
portal_carport_desc: Each carport adds a support vehicle for 1 surveyor. Damaged vehicles must be repaired before they can be occupied by a surveyor.
portal_war_droid_effect: Each droid will reinforce one patrol unit, excess droids will defend the fortress.
portal_repair_droid_flair: I am bender, please insert girder
portal_badlands_desc: The badlands seem to go on infinitely in every direction. There is no measurable curvature to plains over distance causing speculation about the flat nature of this realm. There appears to be nothing out here but desolate wasteland and never-ending hordes of demons.
portal_war_drone_effect: Remotely piloted drones provide air support for your patrols and help reduce the demonic population.
portal_attractor_desc: These arcane beacons attract demons, increasing demonic activity in the area
portal_hell_pit_found: Your hell patrols have found a giant crater that is swarming with unusually high levels of demonic activity.
portal_pit_desc: The "pit" is a giant crater that is swarming with demonic activity. The endless hordes seem to be drawn to this location more than others.
portal_pit_mission_effect: Something is attracting demons to this area. Undertake a mission to find out.
portal_pit_mission_result: There appears to be some kind of ruins in the center of the pit. You will have to secure the ruins to study it further.
portal_assault_forge_effect: Mount an assault force to secure the pit and establish defensive fortifications.
portal_assault_forge_result: Upon securing the ruins, you discover a sophisticated artifact. Further research is required.
portal_soul_forge_desc: Captures the souls of defeated demons
portal_soul_forge_effect: Fuses the souls of defeated demons into a %0
portal_gun_emplacement_desc: Reduces soldier requirement of Soul Forge
portal_soul_attractor_effect: Attracts %0-%1 roaming souls into your Soul Forge per day.
portal_soul_attractor_effect2: Decreases souls required by Soul Forge by %0%.
portal_ruins_desc: The ruins of an ancient city lay here. Crumbling remains of structures lay everywhere and twisted creatures roam the ruins. This place looks to have been abandoned eons ago.
portal_ruins_mission_result: You have found several interesting sites in the ruins worth exploring. Most of the large demon hordes seem to avoid the city for unknown reasons but some dangerous creatures still roam the ruins.
portal_vault_effect: An ancient sealed vault, there is an altar in front of it with %0 sockets that look like they fit Soul Gems.
portal_vault_effect2: The Soul Gems triggered the door mechanism but it jammed. You'll have to repair the door mechanism to open it.
portal_vault_result: Inside the vault you find an ancient tome called the Codex Infernium. You must study this tome to unlock its secrets.
portal_ancient_pillars_effect: %0 large pillars arranged in a perfect circle, it kind of reminds you of Stonehenge. Each one has a different symbol on it.
portal_ancient_pillars_effect2: %0 large pillars arranged in a perfect circle. Each one has a different symbol on it. %1 of the pillars glow with a soft blue light that seems to come from nowhere.
portal_gate_desc: A Massive wall on the far side of the ruined city seems to run across the landscape. A grand gate is present near the ancient ruins. All aircraft sent over the wall stop transmitting immediately and have failed to return.
portal_gate_mission_result: The gate uses a complex locking mechanism which appears impossible to bypass, fortunately for you the Codex Infernium outlines a process to build a "key" to open the gate.
portal_lake_desc: Beyond the wall a large "lake" exists. The lake appears to be filled not with water but with blood. The blood is boiling and tiny bubbles pop across the surface. A steady heat radiates from the surface of the lake. An island can be seen in the distance with a great tower on it.
portal_lake_mission_effect: An unusual large lake exists here, scout the area to establish a base of operations.
portal_lake_mission_result: Samples of the lake water have been retrieved for analysis. A spot has been picked to construct a harbor but the unusual properties of the "water" require more study before anything can be constructed.
portal_cooling_tower_effect: Reduces the power needed to keep your Harbours cool by %0%.
portal_transport_unlocked: Spire Supplies have been unlocked. Goto Resources Tab -> Spire Supply Tab to manage your Supply Cargo.
portal_spire_desc: An island containing an enormous tower exists at the center of the lake. It is so tall you can't see where it ends. Your view of the spire fades into the hazy sky; you feel as if an ominous presence gazes down on you.
portal_spire_mission_effect: Send a team ashore to scout the island with the mysterious spire
portal_spire_mission_result: You sent an expedition ashore to scout the island but a deadly miasma covers the island and everyone who went ashore died.
portal_spire_mission_flair: The air here smells foul, it's probably nothing.
portal_spire_bridge_collapse: A bridge crossing a lava river that leads to the spire appears to have collapsed. You'll have to reconstruct it.
portal_sphinx_desc: A creature guards the spire that you've taken to calling the "Sphinx"
portal_sphinx_effect: It won't let you pass, try to learn how to get past the "Sphinx".
portal_sphinx_effect3: The Sphinx no longer blocks your way.
portal_sphinx_msg: The "Sphinx" has asked you to prove you are worthy by answering a series of complicated mathematical equations. You've also noticed it seems to have a fondness for eating soul gems and likes shiny things, maybe you could bribe it.
portal_sphinx_answer_msg: The Sphinx moves out of the way, allowing you access to the tower.
portal_sphinx_bribe_msg: The Sphinx has given you a book, but it refuses to move out of the doorway.
portal_spire_survey_effect: Survey the inside of the Tower.
portal_spire_survey_msg: A holographic device found in the lobby of the spire indicates that each level of the tower is like a micro world with a unique biome filled with dangerous monsters and that in order to climb the spire you must defeat a floor guardian on each level. You devise a plan to construct combat mechs to ascend the tower.
portal_mechbay_effect: Houses Mechs to assault the Spire
portal_mechbay_unlocked: The Mech Lab has been unlocked. Goto Civics Tab -> Mech Lab Tab to manage your mechs.
portal_waygate_effect: Construct a portal to reach an Elder Demon Lord. This requires blood sacrifices.
portal_waygate_open: Divert your mech forces to battle the Demon Lord.
portal_spire_type_sand_desc: The majority of the terrain is sandy.
portal_spire_type_swamp_desc: Swamp land covers most of the terrain.
portal_spire_type_forest_desc: Trees grow everywhere across the landscape.
portal_spire_type_jungle_desc: Thick jungle like plantlife grows everywhere.
portal_spire_type_rocky_desc: Rocky terrain covers the entire landscape.
portal_spire_type_gravel_desc: A gravel like surface covers the terrain.
portal_spire_type_muddy_desc: The whole landscape is covered in mud that's upto a meter deep in places.
portal_spire_type_grass_desc: A nice grassy surface covers the land.
portal_spire_status_freeze_desc: The air temperature is freezing cold.
portal_spire_status_hot_desc: The air temperature is smoldering hot.
portal_spire_status_hilly_desc: The terrain is not very flat.
portal_spire_status_radioactive_desc: A high Geiger count can be read anywhere in this land.
portal_spire_status_dust_desc: Thick dust coats everything here and gets into everything.
portal_spire_status_river_desc: A river is present here, and must be crossed.
portal_spire_status_tar_desc: Tar pits are scattered around presenting a hazard.
portal_spire_status_steam_desc: Steam jets blast out of fissures across the land.
portal_spire_status_flooded_desc: The whole land is flooded under several inches of water.
portal_spire_status_rain_desc: The rain here never seems to stop.
portal_spire_status_hail_desc: Hail constantly falls from the sky.
portal_spire_status_chasm_desc: A chasm run through the land that must be crossed.
portal_spire_status_dark_desc: No natural light seems to exist here.
portal_spire_conquest: The %0 has been defeated, you have cleared floor %1.
portal_spire_conquest_stone: You have found a %0 Blood Stone.
portal_mech_chassis_wheel_desc: A mech that uses traditional wheels for locomotion.
portal_mech_chassis_tread_desc: A mech that uses treads for locomotion.
portal_mech_chassis_biped_desc: A bipedal mech designed to walk upright.
portal_mech_chassis_spider_desc: A spider mech design using eight legs.
portal_mech_chassis_hover_desc: A mech which glides over the terrain by hovering.
portal_mech_size_small_desc: A small mech with limited capabilities. Not very powerful individually but a swarm of them could overwhelm a target.
portal_mech_size_medium_desc: Medium sized mechs are often the most versatile being adaptable to any role.
portal_mech_size_large_desc: Large mechs are often deployed to counter serious threats, they are costly and slow moving but powerful.
portal_mech_size_titan_desc: Titan class mechs are gigantic, although often considered impractical their massive size allows them to dominate the field.
portal_mech_weapon_laser_desc: Laser weapons fire intense bursts of light to burn targets at long distances.
portal_mech_weapon_flame_desc: Flamethrowers fire jets of ignited flammable liquids at targets. They are most effective at close range.
portal_mech_weapon_plasma_desc: A plasma cutter slices into enemy targets using highly charged particles at medium distances.
portal_mech_weapon_kinetic_desc: Machine guns are traditional kinetic weapons that fire a high volume of metal slugs at a target.
portal_mech_weapon_missile_desc: Missiles can track targets at long distances and blast large areas.
portal_mech_weapon_sonic_desc: Sonic weaponry creates intense vibrations to shake a target apart.
portal_mech_weapon_shotgun_desc: Shotguns fire a spread of projectiles at a target, they are devastating at close range.
portal_mech_weapon_tesla_desc: The Tesla cannon discharges high voltage at a target, it's basically a lightning gun.
portal_mech_equip_shields_desc: Energy shields can protect a mech from a variety of threats.
portal_mech_equip_sonar_desc: Sonar can allow a mech to navigate unimpeded in environments that limit normal vision.
portal_mech_equip_grapple_desc: A grappling hook can be used to help a robot transverse otherwise impassable terrain obstacles.
portal_mech_equip_infrared_desc: Infrared sensors aid mechs operating in low light environments.
portal_mech_equip_flare_desc: Flares can be used for a variety of purposes from illuminating dark areas to signaling allies.
portal_mech_equip_radiator_desc: A radiator to generate heat can stop a mech from freezing up in cold weather environments.
portal_mech_equip_coolant_desc: Extra coolant can prevent a mech from overheating in hot environments.
portal_mech_equip_stabilizer_desc: The stabilizer will help prevent unstable ground from slowing down a mech.
portal_mech_equip_seals_desc: Rubber seals can help keep sensitive equipment clean and operating efficiently.
fortress_threat: %0 demonic creatures have been spotted in the vicinity.
fortress_threat_high: Surveyors will not live long with this much activity.
fortress_threat_medium: Although dangerous, surveyors should be able to operate without too many casualties.
fortress_threat_low: Surveyors should rarely be killed with the current level of activity.
fortress_stationed: Number of soldiers stationed at the fortress.
fortress_sieged: Your fortress was besieged by demonic creatures. The attack was repelled. %0 demons were killed but the walls lost %1% integrity.
fortress_lost: Your fortress was overrun by demonic creatures. All the soldiers and surveyors working there were killed.
fortress_patrol_killed: A patrol was wiped out, all %0 soldiers were killed.
fortress_patrol_casualties_revive: Your patrols suffered %0 casualties but %1 soldiers revived.
fortress_killed: A surveyor was killed by demonic creatures.
fortress_eviscerated: %0 surveyors were eviscerated by demonic creatures.
universe_standard_desc: Стандартная вселенная с обыкновенными законами физики
universe_standard_effect: Это типичная вселенная, особых условий нет.
universe_heavy_desc: The force of gravity in this universe is much stronger than normal
universe_heavy_effect: Transportation fuel costs will be much higher in this universe, but prestige resources earned from non-MAD resets are increased by %0% and an extra %0% for each active Challenge Gene.
universe_antimatter_desc: This universe consists primarily of antimatter
universe_antimatter_effect: Weaker Anti-Plasmids replace Plasmids. Temples always give faith and boost Anti-Plasmid storage effects.
universe_evil_desc: Everything in this universe is evil
universe_evil_effect: If Evil is normal and normal is Evil, is evil 'evil' anymore?
universe_micro_desc: Everything in this universe is small
universe_micro_effect: Everything in this universe is cheaper. However, all prestige resource gains are reduced by %0%. Only micro universe achievements can be earned.
universe_magic_desc: Magic is real in this universe
universe_magic_effect: In this universe real magic exists. It is a force just like any other to be harnessed and exploited.
wiki_main_spoiler: The contents contained in this wiki will spoil the game. Proceed only if you do not wish to discover everything for yourself.
wiki_main_blurb: Evolve Incremental is a web based game about first evolving a species from primordial ooze into a sentient species, then guiding that new species into a mighty civilization that will eventually take to the stars and colonize space.
wiki_main_construction: The Evolve wiki is currently incomplete, please be patient while it gets constructed.
wiki_faq_q_update: Как мне обновить игру после релиза обновления версии?
wiki_faq_a_update: Когда новая версия игры становится доступна, уведомление отобразится в верхней части экрана. Достаточно просто обновить страницу. Перезагрузите кэшированные файлы на странице, нажав CTRL + F5, чтобы убедиться, что контент новой версии уже заработал. Игра поддерживает обратную совместимость с сохранениями старых версий.
wiki_faq_q_hotkeys: Как выбрать несколько предметов или действий?
wiki_faq_a_hotkeys: Зажав специальные горячие клавиши и кликнув левой кнопкой мыши, действие повторится определенное количество раз: Ctrl = 10x, Shift = 25x, Alt = 100x. Горячие клавиши можно комбинировать; ctrl + alt = 1000x.
wiki_faq_q_sethotkeys: Могу я назначить другие горячие клавиши?
wiki_faq_a_sethotkeys: Да, это можно сделать на вкладке Опции.
wiki_faq_q_offline: Возможно ли играть без подключения к интернету?
wiki_faq_a_offline: Нет, но после загрузки страницы игра будет работать, если страницу в браузере не обновлять.
wiki_faq_q_moonphase: Какова продолжительность фаз Луны, циклов и дней?
wiki_faq_a_moonphase: Фазы Луны сменяются циклично. Один цикл длится 28 игровых дней, или 140 реальных секунд. Игровой день длится 5 секунд.
wiki_faq_a_orbital: Если навести курсор мыши на название планеты в верхнем левом углу, отобразится информация об ее периоде обращения вокруг Солнца. Стандартный орбитальный период равен 365 дней. Длительность периода обращения влияет на продолжительность времен года, и, как следствие, на частоту смены погоды и температуры.
wiki_faq_q_lumber: Почему я не могу добывать Древесину?
wiki_faq_a_lumber: При игре за Энтов использование Дерева как ресурса запрещено, а при строительстве сооружений, ранее требовавших Древесину, их стоимость компенсируется увеличением остальных затрат на 5%.
wiki_faq_q_farm: Почему пропали сельскохозяйственные технологии и фермы?
wiki_faq_a_farm: При игре за существ с чертой Хищник сельское хозяйство недоступно. У Хищников заготовкой припасов занимаются Охотники. Раса Кэт всегда обладает чертой Хищника.
wiki_faq_a_steel: Построив Казармы, организуйте набег на один из соседних городов на вкладке Политика и среди награбленных ресурсов может оказаться Сталь. Есть и другой способ: установить торговые пути и с небольшим шансом выторговать невиданный ранее металл. После открытия Стали ресурс становится доступен для торговли.Производство Стали происходит в Плавильне после исследования технологии Тигельная Сталь.
wiki_faq_a_aluminium: Построить Металлообработку и дать работу Каменщикам.
wiki_faq_a_titanium: Вам придется покупать Титан до тех пор, пока не изучите Процесс Хантера и не начнете его производство.
wiki_faq_q_titanium_balorg: Как мне получить Титан, если играю за расу Балорг?
wiki_faq_a_titanium_balorg: Так как Балорги не могут торговать, получение Титана возможно лишь в результате победы в сражениях, за исключением Набегов.
wiki_faq_a_polymer: После строительства вашей первой Фабрики ресурсы становятся доступными для торговли и для производства через вкладку Политика - Промышленность. Прозводство Полимера требует наличие соответствующей технологии.
wiki_faq_a_mythril: В Мастерских, с использованием Иридия и Дюралюмина, после строительства Шахты Иридия на Луне.
wiki_faq_a_infernite: Build Surveyor Carports in the Hell Dimension and assign Surveyor jobs to your citizens. Surveyors must be protected by patrols.
wiki_faq_a_stanene: Stanene is produced by Factories, after researching Stanene.
wiki_faq_a_crates: На Станциях Погрузки расположены Ящики, в Контейнерных Пунктах - Контейнеры. Ящики можно быстро поставить на определнный ресурс, надав на + напротив него. В открывшемся меню ящики и контейнеры можно сконструировать, поставить на склад или убрать. Их создание стоит некоторое количество ресурсов, их можно свободно перемещать между ресурсами по складу. Для перемещения и сооружения ящиков и контейнеров могут использоваться клавиши множителя.Более удобное меню распределения можно найти на вкладке Ресурсы -> Склад.
wiki_faq_a_soft_reset: Soft-reset is used to reset your game back to the evolution stage without reaching a prestige point. However, you will receive no benefit from soft-resetting.
wiki_faq_a_hard_reset: A hard reset permanently deletes all your save data. You should backup your save string before doing this.
wiki_faq_q_combat: How does the combat system function?
wiki_faq_a_combat: The more soldiers you send into combat, the more that can die. Thus, the goal is to send as few as possible while still winning most of the time. Generally, attack with as few soldiers as possible while maintaining a 50% advantage.
wiki_faq_q_morale: What is the effect of morale?
wiki_faq_a_morale: Every 1% above 100% morale increases global production by 0.5%. Every 1% below 100% decreases global production by 1%.
wiki_faq_a_stress: Job stress, unemployment, weather, temperature, taxes, warmonger and entertainment. Job stress is increased with population size and cannot be lowered without the Content gene. Different races receive varying buffs or debuffs from certain weather or temperatures. Every 1% above 20% tax decreases morale by 1% up to 40%, and then every 1% above 40% tax increases morale by 1.5%. Taxes rates below 20% increase morale by 1%. Every 2% below 21% taxes increases max morale by 1%. Warmonger is a temporary morale penalty when sending soldiers on a campaign. Entertainer jobs from the Amphitheatre and various buildings later in the game provide positive morale.
wiki_faq_a_genetic_decay: Genetic decay reduces the number of active Plasmids. However it takes a very very long time to reach decay so you shouldn't worry about it.
wiki_faq_a_cache: It gives a quantity of iron, copper, steel and cement equal to a random number between 1% and 25% of your total storage capacity for each material.
wiki_faq_q_aphrodisiac: What is the effect of the Aphrodisiac technology?
wiki_faq_a_aphrodisiac: It decreases the time needed for a new citizen to grow.
wiki_faq_a_religion: Religion is part of the prestige system. You cannot see it unless you have prestiged at least once.
wiki_faq_a_tax_riots: Tax revolts have a chance to trigger if taxes are greater then 25% and morale is less then 100%.
wiki_faq_q_race: What governs which race I get in each genus tree during the evolution stage?
wiki_faq_a_race: You can choose to evolve as any race which has completed the MAD reset. MAD resetting as 25 unique races unlocks ability to choose any race on MAD reset. The second and third resets allow you to choose any race for the next run. Without the above, the outcome is randomly seeded. Each game assigns a random seed that governs the outcome. Because it is seeded, you will always get the same race if you export your save and then import it before you made the choice, since the seed is the same.
wiki_faq_q_weather: What is the effect of weather?
wiki_faq_a_weather: Weather effects vary per species. Consult the Species page for weather effects, and consult the Planets page for specific weather rules per planet/season.
wiki_faq_a_sundial: The Sundial is the base knowledge income. +1 base, +1 after first MAD reset on the current planet, +1 after Euthanasia Perk, +1 on Magnetic planets.
wiki_faq_q_stoned: What is the "-10% stoned" production penalty?
wiki_faq_a_stoned: The Mellow Planetary Modifier gives this penalty, but also reduces stress.
wiki_faq_a_plasmid: Plasmids are the first prestige resource, all prestige options award Plasmids. They boost production and can be used to buy permanent upgrades from the CRISPR tab.
wiki_faq_q_plasmid_keep: How many Plasmids should I keep?
wiki_faq_a_plasmid_keep: The soft cap for Plasmids is 250 + Phage count. If you are using the "No Plasmids" challenge gene however you may want to just spend them all.
wiki_faq_q_plasmid_earn: What determines the amount of Plasmids I earn?
wiki_faq_a_plasmid_earn: A combination of your living population and the amount of Знания you have spent. Soldiers count as population for this purpose.
wiki_faq_a_crispr: They are permanent buffs that apply to all subsequent playthroughs. Sequencing the genome of your race reveals a new CRISPR tab.
wiki_faq_a_creep: Снижение прироста стоимости строительства новых зданий одного вида.
wiki_faq_a_phage: Phage is the second prestige resource. It is awarded from all reset points other then Mutual Destruction.
wiki_faq_q_phage_earn: What determines the amount of Phage I earn?
wiki_faq_a_phage_earn: Phage earned is tied to the number of Plasmids earned.
wiki_faq_q_phage_benefit: What is the benefit of Phage?
wiki_faq_a_phage_benefit: Phage increases the diminishing return cap on Plasmids by the amount of Phage. There is no cap on Phage.
wiki_faq_a_anti_plasmids: If you are in the Antimatter universe, any mechanic that would normally give Plasmids will give Anti-Plasmids instead.
wiki_faq_q_temple: What is the difference between Anthropology and Fanaticism?
wiki_faq_a_temple: They open different tech trees, Anthropology tends to be better for shorter games while Fanaticism is better for longer games. Anthropology gives a flat bonus to Temples and unique technologies to buff Знания and money. Fanaticism gives a scaling bonus to Temples and unique bonuses to trade and combat, it also gives you the main trait of your ancestor species.
wiki_faq_q_temple_break: When does the scaling Fanaticism Temple bonus break even with Anthropology?
wiki_faq_a_temple_break: You need 15 Professors make Fanaticism break even with Anthropology.
wiki_faq_q_demonic: How do I play as the Demonic races?
wiki_faq_a_demonic: You must earn the Doomed achievement to unlock Hellscape planets.
wiki_faq_q_celestial: How do I play as the Celestial races?
wiki_faq_a_celestial: Celestial races replace demonic races inside the Evil Universe. These also require having earned Doomed to unlock.
wiki_faq_a_mastery: Mastery is a production bonus earned from completing achievements. It requires unlocking first through CRISPR.
wiki_faq_a_challenges: Buy the Hardened Gene CRISPR upgrade. Playing with Challenges give more Prestige resources when resetting. It also unlocks higher tier achievements which award more Mastery.
wiki_faq_a_perks: Perks are permanent bonuses earned from completing specific achievements.
wiki_faq_a_feats: Feats are difficult achievements intended only for completionists. Unlike Perks and normal achievements, they offer no reward.
wiki_faq_a_support: Support is a special type of power found on various space buildings. It is used to power buildings in the same category.
wiki_faq_q_micro: Can achievements be earned in the Micro universe?
wiki_faq_a_micro: Only Micro achievements can be earned for Mastery in the Micro universe. Other achievements will unlock only the Micro icon and offer no general Mastery.
wiki_faq_q_valdi: What happens if I use Fanaticism after doing the Genetic Dead End (Valdi) challenge?
wiki_faq_a_valdi: You get a random minor positive trait instead of all the negative traits.
wiki_faq_q_quantum: What does the Quantum level effect?
wiki_faq_a_quantum: Swarm Satellite cost reduction from Swarm Plants, Factory production bonus from Quantum Manufacturing technology, Warehouse storage bonus from Cargo Yards, and the Interstellar Citadel.
wiki_faq_q_quantum_level: How is the Quantum level calculated?
wiki_faq_q_exotic: Which resources count as Exotic Mass for the Mass Ejector?
wiki_faq_q_soul_gem: How do I get Soul Gems?
wiki_faq_a_soul_gem: Hell patrols have a small chance to find a Soul Gem on each encounter. Run more patrols to increase your odds of finding Soul Gems.
wiki_faq_q_soul_gem_spend: How should I spend my first Soul Gem?
wiki_faq_a_soul_gem_spend: Buy the Virtual Reality tech. Dozens of techs are gated behind it that do not require Soul Gems.
wiki_faq_q_hell_patrol: My patrols in the Hell Dimension die too quickly to replace, what do I do?
wiki_faq_a_hell_patrol: When you first enter Hell, devote all your soldiers to large patrol sizes. It will reduce the Demonic threat level without taking many losses. Then, gradually reduce the size into more patrols. Ideally balance it so that you can have as many patrols as you can reinforce, since more patrols are better if you can support the reinforcement rate.
wiki_faq_q_surveyors: How do I keep my Surveyors from dying?
wiki_faq_a_surveyors: Reduce the demonic threat level by increasing your patrols. If the threat is higher then 1500 Surveyors will die too often to be effective.
wiki_faq_q_defense: How much defense rating should the fortress have?
wiki_faq_a_defense: The demon attack strength scales to their threat rating. Hold them at less then 1500 and have a defense rating of at least 600. ~800 is very safe.
wiki_faq_q_infusion: What is the difference between Exotic Infusion and Stabilize Blackhole?
wiki_faq_a_infusion: After reaching 0.025 Solar Masses of Exotic Mass in the hole, it unlocks a research option to stabilize or infuse it. Exotic Infusion triggers the Blackhole reset, Stabilize Blackhole destroys all Exotic Mass in the blackhole converting it into regular mass at a 1:25 ratio. Stabilize is used to pump up the energy generated.
wiki_faq_q_dark_energy: What determines the amount of Dark Energy I receive?
wiki_faq_a_dark_energy: The amount of Mass and Exotic Mass in the hole, according to this formula: (LN(1 + (exotic mass * 40))) + (log2(mass - 7)/2.5)).
wiki_basics_start_para1: Evolve это игра о построении цивилизации, цель которой - развивать живые организмы до максимального уровня.
wiki_basics_start_para2: Эта инструкция даст общее описание основным геймплейным механикам, поэтому если вы желаете разобраться в этих вещах самостоятельно, рекомендуется не обращаться к данному руководству.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para1: Before you can start conquering the world you must first evolve into a sentient species.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para2: This first phase of the game allows you to guide evolution towards a genus of your choosing.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para3: There are two resources in this phase of the game: %0 and %1.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para4: %0 will passively generate %1, and %2 will generate %3.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para5: Increase your resource capacities by construction %0, %1, or %2.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para6: Many of the techs will warn you that you are at an evolutionary fork, this is a decision you are making that will effect the outcome of evolution.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para7: Each fork diverts your path towards a %0, once a genus is picked it is locked in for the current game run.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para8: Each basic genus has %0 possible species outcomes.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para9: Each genus has unique genus level traits shared by all its potential species, and each species has traits that are unique to that species.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para10: Some of these traits can drastically alter gameplay.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para11: You should not over think your choice here, you will have the opportunity to play other races down the line.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para12: New players often ask what race is best, there is no one best race. They are all different but no race is strictly better or worse then other races.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para13: When you reach %0 that will end this phase of the game giving you a random race from the genus type you have chosen.
wiki_basics_prehistoric_para14: There is no point to over building during this phase of the game as it will not carry over into the next phase.
wiki_basics_civilization_para1: After you have evolved into a sentient species you can begin to build your civilization.
wiki_basics_civilization_para2: The first thing you will need to do is construct some housing and get some citizens.
wiki_basics_civilization_para3: Citizens are the workforce of your city, you can manage what jobs they are assigned to on the %0 tab.
wiki_basics_civilization_para4: You will want to assign your first citizen to gather %0, depending on your species that will either be the %1 or %2 job.
wiki_basics_civilization_para5: The job with an %0 after it is the default job, new citizens will automatically be assigned to the default job.
wiki_basics_civilization_para6: You can change the default job by clicking on another job in the civics tab.
wiki_basics_civilization_para7: You can only assign default job status to the basic job types (those with no cap on them).
wiki_basics_civilization_para8: The earliest challenge is getting enough %0 income to keep your people fed.
wiki_basics_civilization_para9: If you run out of %0 you will go into a %1 state which lowers production.
wiki_basics_civilization_para10: If the amount of %0 you are producing is significantly below your required consumption then people will starve to death.
wiki_basics_civilization_para11: Increase your %0 storage limit to help cover periods of reduced production such as cold weather.
wiki_basics_civilization_para12: You will also want to focus early on any technologies that help with %0 production so you can shift population to other tasks.
wiki_basics_civilization_para13: The primary barrier to progress is %0. Increasing your maximum %0 so you can research more advanced technologies is the main method of advancement.
wiki_basics_civilization_para14: Your first %0 increasing building is the %1. Construct these to allow discovery of more advanced technologies.
wiki_basics_government_para1: Once you unlock %0 you will want to set one in the %1 tab to remove %2.
wiki_basics_government_para2: If you fail to set a %0 you will be in %1 which will cause a growing production penalty depending on how many citizens you have.
wiki_basics_government_para3: There is a cooldown period after changing your %0 type, after which you can change it again.
wiki_basics_government_para4: You will also want to pay attention to your %0.
wiki_basics_government_para5: High %0 (above 100%) will give you a global production bonus while lower %0 (below 100%) will cause a production malus.
wiki_basics_government_para6: The primary method of raising your %0 is through the %1 job, and the primary method of losing %0 is from %2.
wiki_basics_government_para7: Changing your %0 will also affect %1. Higher %0 causes lower %1 and vice versa.
wiki_basics_government_para8: If you raise your taxes above %0% and have morale lower then %1% it can cause a tax riot. These are bad, you should aim to avoid riots.
wiki_basics_mad_para1: Целью вашего первого прохождения должно быть достижение %0.
wiki_basics_mad_para2: %0 появится на вкладке %1 -> %2, как только доступ к нему будет разблокирован.
wiki_basics_mad_para3: Если вы продолжите развиваться в %0, тогда вы перепрыгнете первую точку сброса.
wiki_basics_mad_para4: Вы можете углубиться в игру дальше, но все же рекомендуется проделать сброс, как только появляется такая возможность, ввиду значительного влияния Престижа на геймплей.
wiki_trait_fanaticism: This trait can be inherited from %0 Fanaticism/Deify

Lumber is not available, additional resource Chrysotile is harvested by Quarry Workers. Most resource costs are reduced by 10%.

wiki_trait_effect_heat_intolerance: -%0% global production penalty for each consecutive Hot day.

wiki_trait_effect_brute: +%0% soldier training в секунду & -%1% mercenaries cost.
wiki_trait_effect_carnivore: Unemployed are replaced with Hunters. Agriculture tech is disabled.
wiki_trait_effect_pack_mentality: +%0 Basic Housing cost creep, -%1 Medium/Large Housing cost creep.
wiki_trait_effect_beast_of_burden: Make an extra loot roll on successful attack.
wiki_trait_effect_herbivore: Soldiers do not produce food from hunting.
wiki_trait_effect_puny: Average combat roll reduced by 15%. -%0% Combat Rating.
wiki_trait_effect_intelligent: +%0% production per Professor, +%1% production per Scientist.
wiki_trait_effect_chameleon: Barracks house 1 less soldier. +%0% Combat Rating. Hell patrols are 67% less likely to be ambushed, effect does not combine with Elusive.

wiki_trait_effect_leathery: Negative impact of bad weather on morale is reduced.
wiki_trait_effect_solitary: -%0 Basic Housing cost creep, +%0 Medium Housing cost creep.
wiki_trait_effect_kindling_kindred: Lumber & Plywood resources removed, +%0% cost if building would normally cost Lumber or Plywood.
wiki_trait_effect_sticky: Food requirements are lowered by %0% and combat rating is increased by %1%.
wiki_trait_effect_infectious: Attacking has a chance to increase your population.
wiki_trait_effect_parasite: Natural population growth only occurs when it's windy. Start with 2 Soldiers.
wiki_trait_effect_toxic: +%0% Factory Money/Alloy/Polymer production. +%1% Nano Tube/Stanene production. +%2% Cement production.
wiki_trait_effect_nyctophilia: -%0% Morale when Sunny. +%1% Morale when Cloudy.
wiki_trait_effect_hibernator: Food consumption is lowered by %0% during winter but production is also lowered by %1%.
wiki_trait_effect_infiltrator: Spies are cheaper and you occasionally steal tech advancements. Half the Scout Ships are needed to determine threat in an area.

wiki_trait_effect_cannibalize: Gain Sacrificial Altar. Sacrifice population for boons.
wiki_trait_effect_claws: Combat rating and average combat roll increased by %0%.

wiki_trait_effect_frenzy: Frequent combat raises morale. Warmonger penalty is disabled.
wiki_trait_effect_apex_predator: +%0% Combat Rating. +%1% Hunting production. Armor is disabled.
wiki_trait_effect_environmentalist: Hydroelectric Dams (+4MW) and Wind Farms (+5MW-7MW depending on wind) replace Coal (+5MW) and Oil (+6MW) Powerplants. Windmill power production increased to 1.5MW.
wiki_trait_effect_musical: Entertainers increase morale by an additional 1%.
wiki_trait_effect_revive: Chance for soldiers to revive when killed. Hot temperatures increase chance of triggering effect, cold temperatures lower it.
wiki_trait_effect_forge: Smelters do not require fuel and get the Oil bonus all the time. +%0MW produced by Geothermal Plants.
wiki_trait_effect_autoignition: Library Знания production bonus reduced to %0%.

wiki_trait_effect_ravenous: Food consumption increases with your Food stockpile.
wiki_trait_effect_ghostly: +%0% Food from Hunting. +%1 base Food per Soul Well. +%2% Soul Gem drop rate.
wiki_trait_effect_lawless: Government lockout timer is reduced by %0%.
wiki_trait_effect_mistrustful: Hostilities grow quicker with foreign governments.
wiki_trait_effect_humpback: Starvation threshold increased by %0. Lumberjacks, Quarry Workers, Miners, and Coal Miners produce %1% more.
wiki_trait_effect_terrifying: You cannot trade, however titanium can be gained from combat.
wiki_trait_effect_slaver: You can capture slaves in combat, who boost your productivity.
wiki_trait_effect_compact: -%0 Planetary cost creep, -%1 Space cost creep.
wiki_trait_effect_conniving: %0% better buying prices, %1% better selling prices.
wiki_trait_effect_rainbow: Gain a %0% global production bonus if Sunny after Raining.

Waxing Crescent Moon = Morale Bonus, Waxing Gibbous Moon = Metal Bonus, Waning Gibbous Moon = Знания Bonus, Waning Crescent Moon = Tax Bonus. wiki_mechanics_save_para1: The game is automatically saved once per game day (%0 seconds).
wiki_mechanics_save_para2: Local Storage is used to save your game data, if you wipe out your browsers local storage you will lose your game progress.

wiki_mechanics_save_para6: This is also stored in your browsers local storage and is no more secure then the active game data.
wiki_mechanics_save_para7: Do not attempt to treat it as a safe progress backup, exporting is best for that.
wiki_mechanics_save_para8: %0 merely lets you revert your game to just prior to your last reset incase you screw up your game somehow.

wiki_combat_basics_para1: Once you build a barracks and get some soldiers you can attack rival cities for resources.
wiki_combat_basics_para2: To initiate an attack go to the civics tab and manage your army, there is also a special military tab that shows all military information.
wiki_combat_basics_para3: Assign soldiers to your battalion to use them in an attack campaign.

wiki_combat_campaign_para7: Healthy soldiers will be commited to battle before wounded soldiers, but if you do not have enough healthy soldiers to fill your battalion then wounded soliders will be sent into battle.
wiki_combat_campaign_para8: You should allow your soldiers time to heal rather then sending wounded soldiers into battle as this will almost always result in high casualties.
wiki_combat_campaign_para9: Over commiting soliders to an offensive action is also a mistake, this increases the number of soldiers that can be wounded or die in a single attack action.

wiki_combat_campaign_para14: If your combat advantage is above %0 then you should consider lowering your battalion size to reduce casualties.

wiki_resets_intro_para1: The main method of gaining prestige is through executing a reset option. There are currently %0 reset methods: %1.
wiki_resets_intro_para2: Each option restarts the game and awards prestige resources which accelerates your progress.
wiki_resets_intro_para3: After resetting your first time you will also unlock religion, your new race will always consider whatever race came before them to be their gods.
wiki_resets_mad_para1: Mutual Assured Destruction is the first reset option encountered.
wiki_resets_mad_para2: It it generally recommended that you use this option on your first playthrough as soon as you are able to.
wiki_resets_mad_para3: This unlocks just before the space era and will award %0.
wiki_resets_mad_para4: To unlock this research %0 and then %1. There is no need to build the Launch Facility.
wiki_resets_mad_para5: The option to reset will appear on the %0 -> %1 tab.
wiki_resets_mad_para6: The number of %0 earned will be based on a combination of your total population and knowledge spent.
wiki_resets_mad_para7: Build anything you can within reason that will boost your population before resetting to maximize your %0 gained.
wiki_resets_mad_para8: Soldiers count as population for this purpose.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para1: Bioseed is the second reset option normally encountered in game progression.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para2: To Bioseed reset you must construct and launch the %0.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para3: A Bioseed reset will award both %0 and %1. The amount of %1 earned is derived from the amount of %0 earned so raising your %0 reward will also raise your %1 reward.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para4: %0 earned are calculated similarly to in MAD except there is a higher emphasis placed on knowledge spent.

wiki_resets_bioseed_para6: You can also construct %0 in the %1.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para7: Once your %0 is complete you will be able to launch it which triggers the reset mechanic.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para8: Bioseed will also let you change your planet.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para9: The number of planet options depends on the number of %0 you construct. You get one planet plus one more for each %1 built.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para10: Planets can have a variety of new traits, see the %0 section for more information.
wiki_resets_bioseed_para11: Your new planet is permanent until changed again using a reset mechanic.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para1: Blackhole is the third reset option normally encountered in game progression. It is found at the end of the Interstellar phase of the game.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para2: A Blackhole reset will award %0, %1, and %2. %0 & %1 follow an improved version of the MAD/Bioseed formula while %2 is awarded based on the mass of the Blackhole.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para3: To blackhole reset first you must construct the %0; then you have to beef it up until it it ready to explode.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para4: Increase the mass by building a %0 and using it to eject %1 into the blackhole until it reaches %2 solar masses of %1. Only %3 and %4 count as %1.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para5: Increasing regular mass is not required to trigger the Blackhole reset but it will boost the amount of %0 earned.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para6: Once you have enough %0 in the Blackhole you can reset using a special research option called %1.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para8: If you instead research %0 you will flush all the %1 out of the Blackhole and have to build it back up again.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para9: Exploding the Blackhole results in the destruction of your current universe and lets you pick a new one.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para10: This is the method for switching universes allowing you to reset into one of the following %0 new universes: %1.
wiki_resets_blackhole_para11: In addition to changing universes you will be able to pick from a limited selection of four planets.
wiki_resets_ascension_para1: Ascension is the fourth reset option normally encountered in game progression. It is found at the end of the Intergalactic phase of the game.
wiki_resets_ascension_para2: An Ascension reset will award %0, %1, and %2. %0 & %1 following an improved version of the MAD/Bioseed formula while %2 are awarded based on the number of challenge genes activated.
wiki_resets_ascension_para3: Ascending requires building the %0 (Constructed at Sirius on the Interstellar tab) and powering it with %1MW. This power requirement can be reduced by building %2.
wiki_resets_ascension_para4: Note that before starting your journey into Intergalactic that building the ascension machine requires you spend %0 Plasmids and %1 Phage.
wiki_resets_ascension_para5: Completing ascension will also allow you to build a custom race. You get one custom race slot, doing a second ascension will allow you to alter or replace your previous custom race.
wiki_resets_ascension_para6: Earning ascension in multiple universes and with more challenges active will grant you more design points to build a better custom race with.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para1: Cataclysm is a special reset option that can only be encountered while playing on an %0 planet.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para2: To trigger the Cataclysm you must construct and power the %0 then wait for a random earthquake event to occur.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para3: After the earthquake event you can start the Cataclysm by using the special research %0, picking %1 instead will permanently lock out the Cataclysm for that run.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para4: Once triggered it will place you into a special scenario where you have no home planet. You will continue playing the same race and will not go through evolution again.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para5: Your starting state is predetermined, so do not attempt to game the system by building up excess buildings and materials first as these will not carry over.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para6: You will gain %0 and %1 on par with a Bioseed reset.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para7: Cataclysm is a brutally slow game mode, you should not try it unless you have a lot of prestige.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para8: You can soft reset to get out of Cataclysm if you decide you aren't ready for it.
wiki_resets_cataclysm_para9: Once unlocked the Cataclysm scenario can be picked as a starting game state from the evolution challenge menu.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para1: Causing the destruction of the universe by collapsing the false vacuum is a special reset method that only exists in the Magic universe.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para2: This reset serves the same general purpose as Blackhole allowing you to change universes.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para3: It replaces the Blackhole reset used in other universes, Blackhole is not available in a Magic Universe.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para4: In order to trigger a Vacuum Collapse you must construct %0 Mana Syphons.

wiki_resets_vacuum_para6: Each completed Syphon causes damage to the universe and adds a stacking irreversible debuff called %0.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para7: When the %0th Syphon is completed the reset will trigger automatically.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para8: Vacuum Collapse will award %0, %1, and %2 similar to a Blackhole reset.
wiki_resets_vacuum_para9: The %0 earned however is not based on the blackhole size, it is instead based on your total amount of mana generation.
wiki_resets_infusion_para1: Sacrifice your entire civilization to absorb the essence of a greater demon lord and take your place as a ruler of the hell dimension.
wiki_resets_infusion_para2: This is a special late game reset used to obtain %0.
wiki_resets_infusion_para3: It does not offer any of the other basic prestige currencies.
wiki_resets_infusion_para4: To reach this reset you must conquer the Hell Spire.
wiki_resets_infusion_para5: Once you construct the Waygate you can use it to reach a demon lord. Defeating the demon lord will award a %0.
wiki_resets_infusion_para6: Consume the %0 on the research tab to trigger the reset.
wiki_resets_infusion_para7: Your next race will gain a buff called %0, this buff will decay by 2% in value after every reset until it fully dissipates.
wiki_p_res_plasmids_para1: Plasmids provide a global production bonus. They have a softcap of %0 which can be raised with Phage.
wiki_p_res_plasmids_para2: With CRISPR upgrades Plasmids can also gain a storage boosting effect. This extra benefit is not limited by the Plasmid softcap.
wiki_p_res_antiplasmids_para1: Anti-Plasmids are a special variant of Plasmids which are earned only in the Anti-Matter universe.
wiki_p_res_antiplasmids_para2: In the Anti-Matter universe Anti-Plasmids replace regular Plasmids and are awarded instead of Plasmids from anything that would normally give Plasmids.
wiki_p_res_antiplasmids_para3: Normal Plasmids do not work in the Anti-Matter universe, and Anti-Plasmids do not work outside the Anti-Matter universe.
wiki_p_res_antiplasmids_para4: The %0 CRISPR upgrade can change the relationship between Plasmids/Anti-Plasmids and universes allowing their effects partly operate outside their native universe.
wiki_p_res_antiplasmids_para5: Anti-Plasmids are not disabled by the No Starting Plasmids challenge.
wiki_p_res_phage_para1: Phage extends the Plasmid soft cap by 1 per Phage.
wiki_p_res_phage_para2: With CRISPR upgrades they can also provide a storage bonus.
wiki_p_res_phage_para3: Phage can also be used to purchase permanent ranks of minor traits in the genetics tab.
wiki_p_res_phage_para4: Phage purchased ranks of minor traits are retained on reset and count twice after a reset.
wiki_p_res_dark_para1: Dark Energy is earned from the Blackhole or Vacuum Collapse resets; its effect is different in each universe type:
wiki_p_res_dark_standard: Standard universe, Dark Energy boosts storage capacity.
wiki_p_res_dark_evil: Evil universe, Dark Energy increases combat loot and gives a slight Soul Gem drop rate increase.
wiki_p_res_dark_heavy: Heavy universe, Dark Energy reduces space fuel costs.
wiki_p_res_dark_antimatter: Antimatter universe, Dark Energy increases Power generated by all power sources.
wiki_p_res_dark_micro: Micro universe, Dark Energy reduces cost creep.
wiki_p_res_dark_magic: Magic universe, Dark Energy increases mana generation.
wiki_p_res_harmony_para1: Harmony Crystals are earned exclusively from the Ascension reset.
wiki_p_res_harmony_para2: The crystals boost the effects of Dark Energy and provide a space cost creep discount.
wiki_p_res_harmony_para3: The cost creep discount only works if you have Ascended in the current universe, its strength depends on the challenge level the ascension was completed on.
wiki_reset_intro: The main method of gaining prestige is to reset your run, there are currently %0 methods available for doing this
wiki_arpa_crispr: The CRISPR Lab is unlocked under the ARPA tab and can be used to spend Plasmids to buy permanent upgrades.
wiki_arpa_blood: The Blood Infusion tab is unlocked under the ARPA tab and can be used to spend Blood Stones to buy permanent upgrades.
wiki_arpa_projects: The A.R.P.A. Projects tab is where you can build special super projects. These projects are expensive and can be built in increments. They have no limits and can be repeated infinitely.
wiki_arpa_project_launch_facility: The launch facility is a special one time project with only one rank, it unlocks the space tab and then vanishes from the projects page.
wiki_arpa_project_monument: There are %0 different types of monuments: %1. Each monument type costs a different resource type but they all have the same end effect.
wiki_arpa_project_monument_random: The monument type chosen is picked randomly. The same monument will not be picked twice in a row.
wiki_arpa_project_monument_exceptions: The Pillar of Bones is only available to Evil races, and the Megalith is only available in the Magic universe.
wiki_arpa_project_roid_eject: Blackhole mass gained from asteroids does not contribute to Dark Energy gained on Blackhole reset.
wiki_hell_threat_para1: Unchecked threat will keep growing until it reaches %0.
wiki_hell_threat_para2: The main goal in hell is to reduce this threat level to around %0 and keep it there.
wiki_hell_threat_para3: The primary way of doing this is with patrols, larger patrols will suffer less casualties but more numerous smaller patrols will more effectively combat the threat.
wiki_hell_siege_para1: Periodically the demons will launch an assault on your fortress, this is where fortress defense comes into play.
wiki_hell_siege_para2: The strength of the assault is directly proportional to the overall threat level, so keeping the threat low will weaken the siege.
wiki_hell_siege_para3: Unchecked threat is undefendable, if you take a siege with %0 threat it's almost guaranteed you'll suffer a fortress overrun.
wiki_hell_siege_para4: Defenses repel the demon assault, the higher your defense rating is the less wall damage you will take.
wiki_hell_siege_para5: With enough defense and proper threat reduction management your fortress will be totally secure.
wiki_hell_strategy_para1: It's generally a good idea to start with a small number of large patrols and then transition to a larger number of smaller patrols as you get the threat down.
wiki_hell_strategy_para2: Make sure you can replace your soldiers quick enough that you don't lose patrols due to running out of soldiers, this can lead to a death spiral if you are not able to replace lost soldiers fast enough.
wiki_hell_strategy_para3: When you are able to handle it you should run as many patrols as you safely can, but do not over extend your forces.
wiki_hell_soul_gem_para1: %0 are a rare resource found in the %1 primarily by patrols.
wiki_hell_soul_gem_para2: Each patrol has a chance to find a Soul Gem when it has an enemy encounter, naturally this means the more patrols you run the more Soul Gems you will find.
wiki_hell_soul_gem_para3: You can construct еру %0 to increase the odds of a patrol finding a Soul Gem, however this also raises the general threat level.
wiki_hell_soul_gem_para4: Build Attractors cautiously or you might summon more demons then you can handle.
wiki_hell_sim: This %0 written by %1 can be very a useful tool to calculate your Soul Gem drop rate as well as testing your defenses.
wiki_hell_infernite_para2: Surveyors need to be protected or they will be killed, high threat levels will cause massive casualties while low threat levels will let them do their jobs mostly unimpeded.
wiki_hell_infernite_para3: When a Surveyor dies it takes time to repair their vehicle, a small progress bar can be seen on the Carport showing the repair in progress.
wiki_hell_infernite_para4: The game will attempt to automatically reassign a Surveyor when a new carport becomes available.
wiki_planet_planet_para1: Each planet has a biome that alters its base properties. The starter planet is always a Grassland biome.
wiki_planet_planet_para2: Starter planets have an orbital period of %0 days (year length), seasons are by default each %1 of the orbital period length.
